## Government Tender Announcement

### Invitation to Bidders

The public service of Canada invites bidders to submit their proposals for the provision of Signal and Spectrum Analyzer.

### Tender Details

| Element | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Title | Signal and Spectrum Analyzer |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01014090 |
| Amendment Number | 0 |
| Solicitation Number | ISED205493 |
| Publication Date | November 21, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 9, 2022, 1:00 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | December 10, 2022 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2023 |

### Background

This tendering process is for the acquisition of Signal and Spectrum Analyzer to be used by Industry Canada. Bidders are requested to submit their qualifications and pricing as per the specifications outlined in the attached documents.

### Specifications

Signal and Spectrum Analyzer shall be procured from a supplier that possesses the necessary credentials and technical expertise to fulfill the requirements of this project. The device must be capable of measuring the signal frequency range of 1 kHz to 26.5 GHz, with an accuracy of ± 1.5 kHz. The Analyzer must also be equipped with a built-in measurement function, a graphical user interface, and a USB interface for data transfer.

### Eligibility

The Canadian Government (Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)) entities are eligible to participate.
